tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Check Up,
review:
I have consulted and got delivered by her recently. First of all I will definitely mention about her excellent and polite way of treating patients. I'm extremely Satisfied with her consultation and she's such a cool doctor whom I recommend for every pregnant woman to consult. 
Her explanations, detailed description of ours and baby condition, suggestions for everything to be more better.
Mainly no prescription of unnecessary scans and medicines 
Without her moral support it wouldn't be so easy for me to undergo surgery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: ******** *** ** *** **** ************** * **** **** **** ** **** She empathizes with the patients and understands our problems. She is very experienced and you can see her expertise when you go in for a consultation. Her experience and confidence speak volumes. A very professional doctor as well. I was very fortunate to have her deliver my child and it is always a pleasure to talk to her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My wife visited this hospital for UTI and was consulted by Dr. Julie Thomas. Given the intensity of the problem, I took her straight to emergency, where she was made to wait for 20 minutes before anyone attended to her. Is that what you call emergency care? The doctor who did attend in emergency 20 minutes late was consulting some other doctor on phone before writing her prescription. Such is the state of their emergency department and doctors.

After she was referred to the Dr. Julie Thomas, my wife complained about pain in stomach, vomiting, and weakness. The doctor ****** ** ******** *** ****** said these things don’t happen in UTI. Like, seriously? Even after the patient is telling you that she is suffering from all that and you ignore it. **** * *************** ****** **** ******** **************** ** *** ********* *** ******* ***** *** ****** ******* ******* *** ******** ** ********** ******* ********** *** **** **** ** *** *** ****** ** *** ************ ** *** ***** **** * **** *********** **** **** ** *************** ** *** ******* ********* *** it was disappointing and frustrating. Never going to Cloud nine again and never recommending anyone I know either.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *** ** **** ** ************ ***** ******** ******* *** ****** *** ** *** ******* *** won't even look directly to patients face and as a doctor she should suggest something to us, but if we ask also she won't respond properly. She is of my native, so I thought to speak freely with the doctor, so only I selected her, but it was a wrong choice. **** ** ******* **** *** **** ****** *** ******** **** ********* ** ********** * *** ** **** *****

I have felt safe from the time I have started going to Dr.Julie Thomas. She is very calm patient and answers all questions with understanding and makes the patient feel comfortable. 

She does not prescribe unnecessary medicines and scans which I liked very much and takes the patients preference into consideration .

Doctor is very good
Problem is with the admin and receptionist
They are not at all professional while talking 
Even after booking via practo for the third slot she gave us 5th slot making us wait
The receptionist must get some training on customer service,behavioral and communication

Doctor take 90 min to check 2 patients. Receptionist was extremely rude. Is that what you call a service. When asked at hospital to give a appointment then reply is we don't have an appointment system. You are expected to wait hours on the mercy of how many are ahead of you.

The worst experience ever.... A doctor is supposed to be calm and polite to her patients... This doctor lacks that, very rude and she doesn't just care about her patient's feelings or emotions... Also even my questions were not answered fully... Feeling very disappointed after this visit... I strongly recommend people not to visit her if they need to be treated well...
She wAs v good and she explained everything very well and she was v humble while explaining it , in future also if i need i will visit
She is a very good doctor. Its my first pregnancy and one of my friends reffered her. She visits ramakrishna hospital in electronic city and Srujana in electronic city

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: She was not on time. We waited for more than one hour. Charging more I don't recommend. It's fully waste of time. Not worth for money. Pls don't go there and waste Ur money
It was a good experience even though this is my second visit to the Dr Julie..She explains everything properly.
She was very pleasent and listened to our problem keenly, helped me to gain knowledge and how to workout though i have other problems..

Dr. Julie is one of the few doctors who is ****** ******* *** experienced for guidance in pregnancy. She doesn't prescribe unnecessary scans or medicines. Her cool attitude and honest opinion makes her my go to doctor for any gynecology issue.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: She is very good at explaining all our  doubts in very understandable manner, you will wlk out with all the answers.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Juli is very nice n friendly doctor.appriciate her work n way what he guide to patients.i like doc so much as she take care personally .
Good Doctor. Speaks to the point, prescribe only if and as required. Happy with the consultation.  Defenitely recommend.

Very friendly, felt family the way she cared. Doctor was supportive gave me the right advise. 
God bless her always and new year blessings to Dr. Julie's entire family.
Doctor examined me in a very safe way.
Thankyou so much and grateful for such caring doctors. Am so proud that we have amazing lady doctors in our ountry.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had undergone a surgery under Dr. Julie Thomas ❤️❤️❤️(gynecologist at Kauvery Hospital), who is a well experienced and soft spoken Doctor, 
thanks to all the staff nurses who helped me with everything.❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️

Doctor was good but the hospital appointment was not at all use full. I booked the slot at 12:20pm  and we went at 12:10 pm. But the Hospital staff put me on general queue. I need to Waite for 1.5 hours to get our turn.
If this was the case whats the point in booking the appointment?

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My wife delivered baby girl via normal delivery, thanks to all prenatal suggestions given by the doctor. *** ** *** ** *** **** ****** ******* ** ********** She is very cool, doesn't prescribe any unnecessary medicines, tests or scanning. Another good quality is she listens to the patients carefully and provide most appropriate suggestions. We received her services via Ramakrishna Smart Hospital in E-City phase 1.
she is a very good doctor. listens to the patient's problem and then  explains nicely. her observation is accurate and she never suggest unnecessary medicines and scans
Doctor is really good. She listens us very nicely and gave nice advise like a family doctor. I would love to recommend to family and friends.

context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnant Women Counseling,Pregnancy Tests,
review: Very nice she treated for my wife and gives **** **** ******** *** required medicine. Thanks for the doctor
Very good Doctor , she is asking all the problems. Also she is not giving so much of medicines as well.
Wonderful doctor and she nicely hear from us and then provide consulting. Thats a great advantage with doctor
There is no seating arrangement for the waiting patients. Also the staff was not very friendly. Was charged with the consultantation fee upfront without giving any other information.
good. she advice very nicly. proply consult. NYC doctor. very polite. listened nicely. overall good doctor. NYC.....
it was good. doctor is experienced. explained well. very friendly. didn't wait much. all good.......................
She is not good *** *** ********** **** ****** **** ***** ************* Not recommended and she will charge more.do not waste money by going to Jule .try another were better.
We met doctor Julie Thomas. She is good at listening to our problems & responds well without unnecessary tests/medicines precise to the point and well behaved.
She heard the problems and made me feel completely normal about what i thought were issues. Also, she didn't prescribe any medication and ensured that i should give things time.
Very good doctor. The way she handles patient is very polite, explaining the problem. Am happy with her treatment.
I am very happy with my Dr. Julie Thomas. She is very good, polite and experienced doctor. The way she handle I like her.

review:
Simple, Sweet and Perfect.
I strongly recommend Dr.Julie Thomas as her way of treating patients is awesome.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: The doctor is friendly and explains everything clearly. Very satisfied and would recommend to anyone.
She is so humble.My first visit was the best .she gives answer to  all my questions.I strongly recommend to other to visit Dr. Julie Thomas
Dr. Julie Thomas was very approachable. It did not feel like I was her new patient. She gave appropriate advice which every pregnant woman would love to hear.
****** ** ***** *** hospital charged higher than mentioned in fee and they asked for a registration in their app then only they allowed to consult the doctor

review: I would recommend the doctor. She was friendly and explained to me about the condition and it's causes

review: she was confused and did not cared enough ** *** *****  **** *********** ** *** ******** *** was not ready to explain the cause. she didn't even opened my ultra sound scan,  just went through the summary and never gave any solution.

review: Does not explain the issue. Even when i mentioned associated illness I had and wanted to understand if this is impacting my periods she did not listen at all.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: the doctor was 1.5 hours late. did not care to explain me my problem, or the medication. she was rushing the whole time
She is ok ,but clarification for health issue is not available,I need scanning,but their is no scanning for emergency .it's my bad experience.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Great Expirience with the doctor, value for the money, good expirenced doctor, explain well about the issues
The doctor doesn't makes you worried or advises for unnecessary test.She listen carefully, understand your problem and provide the correct solution required.

tags: Wait time,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: It was not a good experience, We had to wait half an hour before meeting the doctor. I somehow didn't feel confident about what she advised me. Will Not recommend.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: Straight forward, does not scare u unnecessarily or ask for scans/meds not required. Extremely patient, ************* n pleasing personality. This feedback is purely based on personal experience with Dr Julie n it is not for the staff or facilities.

Dr Julie is a good doctor and was comfortable to discuss all the problems.i feel am in safe hands as this is my first pregnancy.
I really appreciate her approach towards the patient.
